name: BNB Agents
description: BNB Agents serve as a hub for AI Agents on the BNB Chain. Powered by $BNBAI, a unified currency for all AI, and build on the operating system designed for inclusive intelligence, this platform forms the foundation of the Agentive Economy. It enables the creation and operation of dynamic AI Agents tailored to diverse use cases. With $BNBAI at its core, BNB Agents seamlessly integrates AI capabilities with blockchain, redefining how intelligence and autonomy function within decentralized ecosystems.
